name: Shih-Hsiang Lin (Browny Lin)
body:
### Current
I am being a web backend developer at a startup company. Developing the RESTful API for our web/mobile client. I am also learning some fronted stuff and hope to be a full-stack developer in the future.

The detailed professional skills I am familiar with could be found in my Linkined [profile](http://tw.linkedin.com/in/brownylin)

### Social connection
I am very keen on digital technology and used to share some interesting stuffs or my thought on the social network. You can find me and connect to me from below

[Twitter](http://twitter.com/brownylin) | [Google+](http://plus.google.com/+BrownyLin/) | [Tumblr](http://inspiration-snippet.tumblr.com/) | [Personal Blog](http://brownywalking.blogspot.com/) | [Dev Blog](http://brownydev.blogspot.tw/)

### Side projects
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
